keyword: how many calories is in a hot dog bun
title: How Many Calories in a Hot Dog Bun?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a hot dog bun, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and variations for different types.
h1: How Many Calories in a Hot Dog Bun?
assumptions: Standard white enriched hot dog bun, about 43 g, plain without seeds, butter, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients (e.g., whole wheat vs. white), and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard hot dog bun contains about 120 calories and 21 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Whole wheat hot dog bun (vs. white)

faqs.q: How many calories is in a hot dog bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 120 calories for a standard white hot dog bun.

faqs.q: Are hot dog buns high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 21 g of carbs per bun, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a hot dog bun?
faqs.a: Around 210 mg per standard bun, from added salt.

faqs.q: Do whole wheat hot dog buns have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Slightly fewer, about 110 kcal, with more fiber (2-3 g).

faqs.q: How does toasting affect calories in a hot dog bun?
faqs.a: Toasting alone doesn't change calories, but added butter or oil increases them by 30-50 kcal per tsp.
